LanguageData.BlueIceThought.stages.0.label: high on BlueIce
LanguageData.BlueIceThought.stages.0.description: I feel pretty good, I am the best, Let's do this!
LanguageData.BlueIceWithdrawal.stages.1.label: BlueIce withdrawal
LanguageData.BlueIceWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm so ill, I'm sweating and I can't concentrate, everything is mixed up.
